TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConfigurationException extends System.SystemException

Attribute.AttributeName: Serializable

summary.span: 發生組態系統錯誤時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a configuration system error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果應用程式嘗試讀取或寫入資料至組態檔但不成功，會擲回例外狀況。The exception is thrown if the application attempts to read or write data to the configuration file but is unsuccessful. 一些可能的原因可以包含格式不正確的 XML 組態檔、 檔案權限問題，和組態屬性具有無效的值。Some possible reasons for this can include malformed XML in the configuration file, file permission issues, and configuration properties with values that are not valid. > [!NOTE] > 物件保留在回溯相容性。The object is maintained for backward compatibility. 物件會取代它的組態系統。The object replaces it for the configuration system.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 取得擲回此組態例外狀況原因的描述。

span.span: Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.

value.span: 擲回這個 例外狀況原因的描述。

span.span: A description of why this exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不包含名稱的組態檔中，也不在這個行號發生例外狀況。The property does not contain the name of the configuration file, nor the line number at which this exception occurred. 如果您想包含的組態檔和行號，以及所傳回的訊息名稱的訊息屬性，請使用屬性。If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message returned by the property, use the property.

value.span: 導致此 例外狀況擲回的組態檔之路徑。

span.span: The path to the configuration file that caused this exception to be thrown.

summary.span: 以發生這個組態例外狀況的檔案名稱和行號，設定 物件。

span.span: Sets the object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定物件，此檔案名稱和行號發生例外狀況。The method sets a object with the file name and line number at which this exception occurred. 還原序列化期間，例外狀況從重組透過資料流傳輸的物件。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the object that is transmitted over the stream.
